body.name: Rubbermaid Reveal Spray Microfiber Floor Cleaning Kit for Laminate & Hardwood Floors, Spray Mop with Reusable Washable Pads, Commercial
features: MULTI-SURFACE USE: Safe to use on all floor types including hardwood, vinyl, laminate and tile
50% MORE DIRT PICKUP: Microfiber cleaning pad picks up 50% more dirt and dust per swipe than traditional mops
WON'T HARM SURFACES: Non-scratch scrubber for stubborn spots
REFILLABLE BOTTLE: 22 ounce refillable bottle allows you to mix your own solution
EASY TO USE: Simply fill the bottle with hot water and two teaspoons of your favorite cleaning solution and you’re ready to mop
MACHINE WASHABLE PADS: Microfiber pads are reusable and machine washable up to 100 times
NO BATTERIES REQUIRED: Non-battery operated spray trigger allows you to dispense as much or as little solution as you need to clean your floor
GREAT DESIGN: Constructed with durable, yet lightweight material
CONTENTS INCLUDE: 1 Spray Mop, 2 Refillable Bottles, 3 Reusable Microfiber Mopping Pads, 1 User Manual
body.description: Save more and waste less with the Rubbermaid Reveal Spray Microfiber Floor Mop Cleaning Kit. The thick microfiber pad is washable and reusable so that you never have to run to the store for refills when you’re getting ready to clean. Simply fill the bottle with hot water and two teaspoons of your favorite cleaning solution and you’re ready to mop. The Reveal Spray Mop also features a nonscratch scrubbing pad to loosen stubborn spots. Includes 1 commercial mop, 3 multi-surface microfiber wet mopping pads, and 2 refillable bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rubbermaid stick mop
reviews.reviewText: You can't beat a Rubbermaid product for durability and price. Love the fact I got 3 reusable pads. Works great and easy to use, add your own cleaner to bottle and get clean up done fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Low Tech High Quality
reviews.reviewText: In 30+ years of adulting I’ve used every kind of mop out there. This is by far my favorite. The bottle for the cleaning solution is easy to take out, fill, and put in. You can use any kind of cleaning solution. The mop head swivels, but not too much. The mopping pads can be thrown in the washing machine. Best of all it doesn’t leave streaks on the floor, so the floor actually looks clean when you’re done. I don’t usually get excited about things like mops, but this one makes my life easier. Best mop ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best mop hands down!
reviews.reviewText: Have you ever dreamed of being a Jedi, wielding a mop instead of a lightsaber, fighting off the dark forces of grime on your laminate and hardwood floors? Well, Rubbermaid's Reveal Spray Microfiber Floor Cleaning Kit makes that dream a reality!Upon unboxing this bad boy, I felt a surge of cleaning power as if I was holding Excalibur. The assembly was as easy as pie – even easier than pie, actually, more like making a sandwich. *Click*, *snap*, and ta-da! I was armed and ready to vanquish dust and stains.The reusable washable pads are the unsung heroes of this mop saga. They're like loyal sidekicks that never let you down. Pop one on, fill the spray bottle with your preferred cleaning solution (mine was a homemade concoction that smelled suspiciously like lemons), and you're on your way to a cleaner kingdom.The spray action is where the magic happens. A gentle squeeze of the trigger releases just the right amount of cleaning solution, not too much to flood the kingdom, nor too little to leave spots untouched. The microfiber pad eagerly absorbs the mess like a thirsty sponge in a desert.Now, let's talk about the maneuverability. This mop glides across the floor with the grace of a figure skater. I even threw in a few spins and twirls – okay, maybe I got carried away, but it was fun! The handle is comfortable and sturdy, unlike some flimsy mops that feel like they might snap mid-battle.But wait, there's more! It's not just a mop; it's a multitasking warrior. Want to reach under furniture? Simply bend it like Beckham, and this mop gets low without breaking a sweat. It's a limbo champion in the cleaning world!However, every hero has its kryptonite. The refillable bottle sometimes decides it's fun to play hide-and-seek with the trigger, making me wish for a GPS tracker. Also, I had to channel my inner Houdini to remove the pad for washing – a bit more effort than anticipated.In conclusion, Rubbermaid's Spray Mop is a force to be reckoned with in the battle against grime and dirt. It's a cleaning sidekick that turns mundane chores into an epic quest. So, if you're looking to turn cleaning into a heroic adventure, grab this mop and unleash your inner Jedi – just watch out for the refillable bottle's vanishing act!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best Spray Mop I've Used (After One Upgrade)
reviews.reviewText: I’ll start by saying that I really don’t like cleaning. I look for any ways to cut down on the amount of time it takes, so a spray mop is a must-have. The problem is spray mops are notorious for breaking but so far the reveal mop’s been solid as they come.Here’s my breakdown of the mop based on my experience with it so far.Overall Build Quality - Although the mop is mostly plastic (except the pole), it still feels like high quality. It’s lightweight with no setup required and the pivoting head makes it easy to reach anywhere.Sprayer/Bottle - The spray has some serious range! If you have the handle tilted back it will spray about 6 feet ahead. The spraying range can be decreased simply by tilting the handle into a more vertical position. The bottle also seems to work very well. I haven’t noticed any leaking when removing/reinstalling it and it’s easy to refill.Pads - Now the pads are the one aspect of this mop I think could be improved. After all, the pads are the part of the mop that’s picking up all the dirt. The Rubbermaid pads are not terrible, pretty much your standard microfiber mop pad. But they’re a bit on the thin side and I can tell they aren’t going to hold their form very well after washing - they were already a bit wrinkly when they were fresh out of the box. The small scrubber pad is a nice touch but I’m hesitant to use it on my wood floors since it’s fairly abrasive.That said the pads are the easiest part of the mop to fix. I saw some other reviews that mentioned different pads called turbo pads ( these ones ) so I grabbed a pack of those as well. These are noticeably thicker (see pictures) and appear to use two types of fabric. I’ve only used them a couple times so far but they pick up dirt and cat hair really well. Basically fixing the main issue I had with the mop.So overall I’m very happy with this mop. Don’t get me wrong, I still don’t like cleaning, but the reveal mop makes it a bit better - even my cat approves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I still don’t like housework, but this helps!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mop when I decided it was time to rethink my lifelong method of washing floors on hands and knees with a bucket and a rag. I’ve owned other mops but found them not worth the trouble. So far, I like this one pretty well. The upsides are: any brand of cleaning fluid can be used in the container; the container is easy to remove and fill; the container can site upright on a flat surface (such as a countertop) when being filled; the mop is lightweight and easy to maneuver; the cleaning pad is easy to remove and clean in the washer; the mop head is large enough to clean a floor rather quickly; the spray nozzle works well. The downsides: because the mop head is large, it’s hard to get it into small spaces; the spray sometimes goes onto the baseboards or other areas adjacent to the floor. Overall, a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product - Does exactly what it advertises.
reviews.reviewText: Hated cleaning my hardwood floors, but now it is not such a chore. Easy to do, without the mess of buckets, water everywhere and crawling around on my hands and knees. Definitely glad I purchased it and now I keep my floors much cleaner, as it only takes a few minutes to pull out, mix up a small amount of cleaner and hit the floor. I defintely recommend.

C'est mon premier balai serpillère de ce type et je suis très satisfait du principe.Le sol sèche très vite et pour moi c'est un avantage important.Je connaissais la qualité Rubbermaid pour d'autres produits. J'espère qu'il durera des années.Il y a un point perfectible. Ce serait la modification de l'emplacement du réceptacle du bidon. S'il était situé plus haut ce serait plus pratique pour passer sous les éléments bas et profonds de la cuisine et d'autres meubles qui ont une faible garde au sol.

Without question this mop is the best that there is. Unlike other mops where the spray mechanism breaks easily or operates inconsistently, these mops work for years. We are only buying a new one because we shifted countries. The other important fact is that the mopping surface is always level and covers the full area of the pad, unlike other mops which can lift at the edges. The pads are durable and work well. The entire product is well constructed.The only disappointment was not related to the mop itself but to the shipping company used by Amazon to send the product to Spain. Two shipments were lost, and the company used has a bad reputation which does not reflect well on Amazon. Of course this experience probably won’t apply in Germany or other EU states.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy útil para los accidentes del día a día
reviews.reviewText: No creo que esto sirva para la limpieza profunda, pero es muy útil para limpiar accidentes caseros y de mascotas sin tener que gastar tanta agua, o en días que de plano no da tiempo de limpiar a fondo. Muy sencillo de usar y no pesa. Al usar menos agua, seca de volada.

Mop comodissimo, ma va migliorato.Quanto dura? Arrivato il 20/12/2021 dopo utilizzo 1 o 2 volte a settimana per un appartamento di 100 mq. non funziona più. Ha 1 anno e 2 mesi di vita.Il problema è diffuso guardando le recensioni.È necessario migliorare il sistema di pompaggio dell'acqua, il dispositivo smette di spruzzare.Il pistone della pompa si incastra nel suo cilindro.
